content.raw: shasum will not work when we move to Windows. It may be worth using the boost version since this is not a critical change, and the pull-request is aimed to support multiple platforms. Alternatively, create an issue to track boost shasum support for this test.
content.html: shasum will not work when we move to Windows. It may be worth using the boost version since this is not a critical change, and the pull-request is aimed to support multiple platforms. Alternatively, create an issue to track boost shasum support for this test.
